RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT cactus_stereoa_flow.hec_id,cactus_stereoa_flow.sat_id,cactus_stereoa_flow.r_hci,cactus_stereoa_flow.long_hci,cactus_stereoa_flow.lat_hci,cactus_stereoa_flow.time_start,cactus_stereoa_flow.duration,cactus_stereoa_flow.pa,cactus_stereoa_flow.pa_width,cactus_stereoa_flow.v,cactus_stereoa_flow.dv,cactus_stereoa_flow.v_min,cactus_stereoa_flow.v_max,cactus_stereoa_flow.cme_number,cactus_stereoa_flow.flag_halo,cactus_stereoa_flow.event_detail FROM cactus_stereoa_flow WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: dv
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Variation (1 sigma) of velocity over the width of the CME

FIELD.name: v_min
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Lowest velocity detected within the CME

FIELD.name: v_max
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Highest velocity detected within the CME maxv Highest velocity detected within the CME

FIELD.name: flag_halo
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: CME number [[corresponds to column 'CME' in the original file without leading zeros]]

FIELD.name: event_detail
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Link to details and graphs of specified CME [yymm-CME0010]
